Subject: SIDI - Users cannot log in - URGENT
Description:
Hello Team,

Do you have availability for a meeting tomorrow 13, 14 or 15h BRT? The costumer cannot log in with any user that they have and lost connection with the console.

Best regards,
Solution_Comment__c:
- optimized the EPP server resources to the current resources allocated. Previously extremely high resources were configured and this caused the slow UI response times.
- we also rebooted the EPP server as it was online for 175 days
- we updated the AD Admin Authentication with the correct LDAP
- we also disabled the "Ignore AD Authentication" option for all admins
